attributes.action: Make MP’s expenses open to public scrutiny and make them accountable to voters
attributes.additional_details: I am incensed to find the the Labour MP Angela Rayner has claimed for 2 lots of air pods in 2 months at a cost of 249.00 each when some families can’t feed their children
attributes.background: Allow an independent adjudication of MP’s expenses and publish them in the constituency they serve allowing their voters to see just where tax payers money is going

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
